answerText: derivative[10] One a three-dimensional surface, this is the term for a point that is a maximum along one axis but a minimum along another. The hyperbolic paraboloid has one of these points.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 10 | 3 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question: When applied to the product of two functions, the result of this operation is calculated using the chain rule. For 10 points each: [10] Name this operation, which is equal to the limit of f of x plus h minus f of x divided by h as h goes to zero. It is equal to the rate of change of a function at a given point.
